BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_NOC_ISS_DTL (STR_APP_NO,DT_APP_DATE ,STR_EMP_NO,NUM_SUB_ID,STR_PURPOSE,STR_REMARKS,STR_STATUS, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_NOC_ISS_DTL A SET A.STR_APP_NO=?,A.DT_APP_DATE=?,A.STR_EMP_NO=?,A.NUM_SUB_ID=?,A.STR_PURPOSE=?,A.STR_REMARKS=?,A.STR_STATUS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_APP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_NOC_ISS_DTL A SET A.STR_HOD_EMP_NO=?,A.DT_HOD_FWD_DATE=?,A.STR_HOD_REMARKS=?,A.STR_STATUS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_APP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_NOC_ISS_DTL A SET A.STR_NOC_STATUS=?,A.STR_NOC_ISS_BY=?,A.STR_NOC_NO=?,A.DT_NOC_DATE=?,A.DT_NOC_VAL_FR_DATE=?,A.DT_NOC_VAL_TO_DATE=?,A.STR_EST_REMARKS=?,A.STR_EST_OBJ_REMARKS=?,A.STR_STATUS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,A.GNUM_ISVALID=?,A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_APP_NO=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_NOC_ISS_DTL T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.STR_APP_NO=? amd T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
